programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its day two in East Lancashire and young businesswoman Jenna Tattersall is hosting an evening dressed in white to party all night. Is there a message for her guests in her starter of `get stuffed courgettes? Snobby Chelsea Symcox certainly thinks so. Will Jennas bouncy castle entertainment on full stomachs end in tears?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The third day in East Lancashire sees perfectionist Chris Slater try his hardest to add a touch of class. He makes the guests take off their shoes to admire his immaculate interiors. The starter goes down well, but Nigel eating with his mouth open disgusts his fellow diners. The spicy main course leads to acid reflux for Jenna who forgot to bring her tablets, and then Nigel disgraces himself over a shortbread biscuit.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Chelsea Symcox is preparing a Mediterranean menu for her guests. The evening begins with the boys having a punch-up over a punch bag in Chelseas garage. Then the girls discover Chelseas credit card and a secret shes been keeping from them.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Pokemon Horizons: The Series
programme.desc: A new adventure begins as Liko receives her first partner Pokemon, Sprigatito!

programme.title: Bros in Control
programme.desc: Adam and Joe are joined by their dogs to help them in the kitchen. The fluffy sous chefs get to work on baking Callums dog Bailey a doggy treat.

programme.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
programme.desc: Nitro and Fury prank Cyclone, who thinks she is filming an animal-theme exercise video dressed as a turtle. The other Gladiators have fun pranking the audience at Sheffield Arena.

programme.sub-title: Canadian Adventure featuring Walking with Dinosaurs Competition

programme.title: Newsround

programme.title: Deadly Predators
programme.desc: Steve goes in search of some of the most powerful predators on the planet. At historic Warwick Castle, meet the stellar sea eagle, worlds heaviest eagle. Eagle Nikita is an expert at lifting fish up to one third of her body weight out of the ocean to eat. To demonstrate this ability up close, Steve has a time slice rig.

programme.title: The Bishops Wife
programme.desc: Henry has spent so long raising money for a new cathedral that hes completely forgotten about his poor wife Julia. Enter Dudley, an angel whos about to make them both happy.

programme.title: Gardeners World
programme.desc: Frances Tophill is back at Damson Farm, lending a hand with autumn jobs in the garden. She learns of a clever recipe for making an architectural compost cake, plants a container with evergreens and spring bulbs, and takes hard wood cuttings from a tree with beautiful berries. Theres a teacher whos planted hundreds of apple trees on his allotment. Nick Bailey explores the science of how sun-loving plants must adapt to try and survive and thrive in the shade.

programme.title: Rick Steins Cornwall
programme.desc: Rick drops in on the fishing port of Boscastle and finds a fabulous seafood restaurant in a building which once housed rockets used to fire safety ropes out to sinking ships.

programme.title: Mary at 90: A Lifetime of Cooking
programme.desc: Sports broadcaster Gabby Logan joins Dame Mary in the kitchen to cook some of her standout time-saving recipes. Gabby asks Mary to share her own tales of being a working mum 50 years ago - the early days when Mary was one of the first TV cooks. Gabby is keen to cook, and she has come to the right place, because from the start of her career, the core of Marys focus has been helping busy, working families with simple dishes for when time is short.

programme.title: Alison Hammonds Florida Unpacked
programme.desc: Alison and Aidan zoom to Fort Lauderdale on a high-speed affordable train, hit the thrift shops with a local pro, and then hop on an airboat for a wild Everglades tour.

programme.title: The Robe
programme.desc: A Roman centurion in charge of the crucifixion of Christ is profoundly affected by the experience and converts to Christianity.

programme.title: The Desert Rats
programme.desc: English captain MacRoberts, a British officer in charge of Australias 9th Division, defends a strategic outpost against Rommel and his henchmen. Despite capture, he manages to escape and lead his men to safety.

programme.title: Celebrity Race Across the World
programme.desc: Four familiar faces - Roman Kemp, Dylan Llewellyn, Anita Rani and Molly Rainford - set off with a loved one on an epic 5,900km race through Central America. The race begins on Isla Mujeres, the easternmost point of Mexico.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: With the German Army now just across the Channel, newly-appointed Prime Minister Winston Churchill must decide between negotiating a peace treaty with Hitler or standing firm. With the King, the public and his own political party all questioning his wisdom, the hard-drinking Churchill has to survive his own darkest hour and rally the country behind him.

programme.title: Ramsays Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon travels to Loudonville, Ohio, to rescue the struggling Landolls Mohican Castle, a custom-built, multi-million-dollar hotel set in an 1100-acre woodland estate.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The latest competition kicks off at the Yellow Submarine in Liverpool, where hosts Alfie Bubble and celebrity Philip Olivier offer guests a floating, Beatles-themed experience. The guests find Phils pin-up calendars in their quarters before heading off on a sea voyage, where Megan becomes sea sick. Next morning there are great expectations for Phil and Alfies breakfast but it turns into a comedy of errors.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Manor Lodge in Cornwall is the latest to host, where Megan Edgcumbe and Dick Stanley try to make the guests feel at home. Things get off to a positive start, when the guests find the rooms spotless. Later on Megan drops a bombshell about her posh background, while Dicks eight inch Cumberland sausage causes quite a stir among the guests at breakfast.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Third to hosts in this weeks competition are James and Judith Calderbank, owners of the very rural Ashculme House in Devon, but the back-to-basics approach doesnt go down well with all the guests. Workaholic Alfie worries that his business may go down the tubes with no phone signal, while competitive Megan and Dick relish finding dust in their cosy outside building.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final BandB of the week is Satis House in Suffolk, where Kevin Wainwright and partner David Little think Satis-factions guaranteed. However the hosts are fearful that it might be tit for tat when Megan and Dick are delighted to find one oversight in their room and their bacon too crispy at breakfast.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The BandBers come together one last time to find out what theyve been paid and confront their critics head on. Alfie and rival owner Megan get into a debate about Alfies fast food breakfast and Megan wants to know why Alife thought it necessary to use a hairdryer to heat up his room. David and Kevin get teary eyed as they realise they misjudged Alfie and Phil.

programme.title: Game of Wool: Britains Best Knitter

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Dianes fascination with Sams older brother brings their long simmering relationship to a boil when the sibling asks Diane to go to Paris with him.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: The regular gang finds Sam and Dianes romance hard to believe, a view apparently shared by Diane, who throws Sam out of her apartment after only five minutes.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: While Carla is in hospital having a baby, her seemingly demure sister Annette steps in at Cheers, and quietly hits on every male there.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Carla claims that Diane is getting preferential treatment as the boss girlfriend, and Diane decides that its time to seek a new, mentally stimulating challenge.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray uses an active listening technique learned in parenting class on his stubborn parents.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray reluctantly agrees to take Robert out on the anniversary of his divorce, but is disturbed by the `brotherly bonding thing that develops.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond

programme.title: Frasier

programme.desc: Roz reconsiders her plans to leave KCAL for a new job due to growing concern over Frasiers budding relationship with Julia, and Daphne and Niles decide to start a family once they send her mother packing.

programme.title: Formula 1

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: When Bart teaches Homer to download pirated movies, he is thrilled until he gets caught.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: When Comic Book Guy meets a woman writing an autobiographical manga, he seeks Homers advice on dating.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me: The Professionals

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Samantha and Sam are looking for their dream holiday home in Oliva, Spain, that will work for the whole family. Lee Juggurnauth shows them what their £85k can buy.

programme.title: Channel 4 News

programme.title: Titanic: Secrets of the Shipwreck
programme.desc: A compelling account of the search for the wreck of the Titanic, 40 years on from its discovery in the depths of the Atlantic, featuring the efforts of Texan oil man Jack Grimm.

programme.title: Titanic: Secrets of the Shipwreck
programme.desc: Following the failed missions of billionaire oil man Jack Grimm, the scientist and explorer Robert Ballard comes forward as the next lead searcher. Ballard uses the cover of US Navy missions looking for lost nuclear submarines to find the wreck.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA

They even put up their houses as collateral! Unfortunately, soon Charlies was in trouble.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Everyone is toasting Chandler and Monicas engagement, but after Chandler fails to come up with the goods in the bedroom, he begins to worry about the consequences. Elsewhere, Monica thinks Rachel is trying to steal her glory when she catches her kissing Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monicas dream of a fairytale wedding fizzles out after she learns what her parents have done with her wedding fund. Meanwhile, Rachel fumes when a teasing Joey stumbles across her juicy late-night reading material.

programme.title: Beethovens 2nd
programme.desc: Comedic sequel reuniting the grown-up St Bernard Beethoven and his reluctant owner, George Newton, and family. programme.title: Friends

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel must hire an assistant and agonises over whether to hire an efficient, experienced woman, or sexy young Tag Jones. Ignoring her friends advice, she hires Tag and soon regrets it. To make matters worse, Tag is attracted to Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Engagement Picture
programme.desc: While taking an engagement picture for himself and Monica, Chandler cant stop pulling a strange face, Rachel enlists Joey to take Tag out for a night on the town, and Phoebe and Ross date a couple in the middle of a divorce.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Nap Partners
programme.desc: Wedding fever continues when Monica cant decide whether to appoint Rachel or Phoebe as her maid of honour. To help Monica decide, Joey and Ross test them on how they would react in certain wedding situations.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rosss Library Book

programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Doesnt Like Dogs

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Candy
programme.desc: Rachel is dating her assistant, Tag, but they must keep it a secret at work because of the companys anti-dating policy. Her friends warn her that the relationship will only cause her trouble, but just for fun, she becomes more brazen about it.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Holiday Armadillo

programme.sub-title: The One With All the Cheesecakes

programme.sub-title: The One Where Theyre Up All Night

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig receives a letter saying he must go away on business to test some very important concrete. Peppa, Mummy and George all decide to go with Daddy and enjoy a train journey, where they sing to pass the time and even have a sleep on the train.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: A curious, naive, yet friendly little pig navigates through her life with her friends and family by her side. Guided by her loving mother and brash father, Peppa is stuck almost every day. Her little siblings, however, look up to Peppa lovingly.

programme.desc: Drew Pritchard runs a decorative salvage yard and is constantly looking for new stock.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard runs a decorative salvage yard and is constantly looking for new stock.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus and his team are called out to house clearances, looking through a lifetimes worth of personal possessions, and deciding what to sell at auction, what to recycle and what should be taken to the tip.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Angus is excited to clear out a historic property in Long Itchington. Each room is full of interesting items, including vintage furniture and precious jewellery.

programme.title: Celebrity Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth and his team help celebrities clear their homes of clutter. They look for hidden gems to be auctioned off for profit.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Experts Natasha Raskin Sharp and James Braxton are in the Devonshire countryside for an antiques expedition. Both are Road Trip veterans but this is the first time theyve squared off against each other. With £200 to spend, and a rather sporty 1970s Porsche to whisk them all over the county, they set off on the hunt for money making treasure.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Seasoned trippers Natasha Raskin Sharp and James Braxton explore the back roads of Devon and Somerset from behind the wheel of a fiery-red Porsche. Theyre up for the challenge of finding profitable antiques and even pen the odd verse of poetry along the way. James has an eye for some Scandinavian furniture ideal for serving cocktails while Natasha indulges her cute and cuddly side as she gets her hands on a menagerie of furry creatures.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: The halfway point of the trip sees experts Natasha Raskin Sharp and James Braxton hitting the shops of Somerset and Wiltshire. However, their Porsche has developed some rude noises and unpleasant smells. Both trippers are strapped for cash so its time to get serious, James adopts the persona of a 13th century warlord in preparation for haggling.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques afficionados Natasha Raskin Sharp and James Braxton are on the penultimate leg of their journey. And, after the worrying results from the last auction, theyre just scraping by. As is their 1970s Porsche. James flexes his finely tuned antique finding muscles and pins his hopes on some of his beloved bamboo and a very rude dog.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Its the end of the tour for Natasha Raskin Sharp and James Braxton as they pilot their Porsche towards Oxfordshire and their final chance to shine. With money in their pockets and a renewed sense of purpose, the competition is heating up. As they hit the shops, Natasha finds it hard to adjust to a healthier budget. James finds himself in shed heaven as he sidesteps his way through a series of outbuildings chock full of antique furniture.

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: At Witley Recycling Centre in Surrey, Sarah Moore is on the lookout for items to salvage, spruce up and sell on. To help her turn trash into cash, Sarah enlists the help of designer-maker Rupert Blanchard to give new life to an old window.

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: Upcycler Jay Blades is at Altrincham Recycling Centre on a mission to rescue and revive unwanted items. With three eclectic skip-finds to transform, Jay turns to woodworker Bruce Faulseit to restyle a collection of discarded drawers.

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: Sarah Moore is in Surrey, checking out the cast-offs at Witley Recycling Centre on a mission to save three unwanted items before they hit the skip. Audio engineer Horse has his work cut out trying to transform a 1950s television.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: The team restore a designer handbag gifted to a young woman for the part she played in trying to make 1960s Britain better, a toy tractor that was owned by a farmer who died in a tragic accident, and a family heirloom that has lost its edge.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Theres a little bit of mischief to be had at the barn when Jenny and her brother Mark arrive with a very special delivery marked for the attention of musical instrument expert Pete Woods. The vintage brass car horn, held together with duct tape, was the proud possession of their late brother Peter.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Lucia Scalisi and Will Kirk restore an elegant wooden desk connected to the suffragette movement, Kirsten Ramsay revives a shop mannequin that was badly bombed in the Blitz, and Brenton West brings the shine back to a sporting memento.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: An oppressive force has been tormenting Sonia and Baz ever since they extended their house. On the verge of splitting up, they desperately need help. The team must work quickly to bring peace to the property and save the relationship.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: Jacqueline and Dan are living in fear after years of frightening paranormal activity. Time is running out, so the team make the brave decision to spend the night.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Ogre Shrek and his new wife Fiona are surprised to discover a letter from her parents, inviting them over for dinner. Fiona is eager to show off her new husband, but her parents dont yet know shes an ogre. Taking Donkey along, they set off for Far Far Away to visit them, but the trip is hampered by the jealousy of a wicked fairy godmother and her hired assassin, Puss in Boots.

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: After an alien race called the Boov take over Earth, a resourceful human girl becomes a banished Boovs ally.

programme.title: Dragon Rider
programme.desc: A dragon, an orphaned boy, and a mountain spirit work together as they trek through the Himalayas in search for the Rim of Heaven.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Spoiled by their upbringing and with no idea of what wildlife is really like, Alex the lion, Marty the zebra and hypochondriac giraffe Melman swap New York Central Zoo for madcap Madagascar, on a journey to find their friend.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: Tintin and his dog Snowy buy a model of a three-masted sailing ship `The Unicorn at a market and are immediately accosted by two people who both want to buy the model from Tintin. Tintin takes the model ship home and is later shot at and then kidnapped on board a ship with Snowy. Will they escape in time, and solve the mystery of the secret of the Unicorn?

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Princess Odette and Prince Dereks wedding anniversary celebrations are rudely interrupted by evil wizard Clavius, who once again wants to conquer the world. When Clavius kidnaps Queen Uberta, Odette and Derek must put a stop to his fiendish schemes.

programme.title: The Swan Princess
programme.desc: A beautiful princess falls in love with a prince from another land, but an exiled magician who wants her for himself conjures up a spell to transform her into a swan. Forced to embark on a dangerous quest to reverse the magic, the princess is helped along by some new-found animal friends.

Forced to embark on a dangerous quest to reverse the magic, the princess is helped along by some new-found animal friends.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Mechs vs. Mutants
programme.desc: Gotham City faces catastrophe when Mr Freeze transforms Killer Croc and Bane into mega-sized mutant monsters. As the gigantic villains go on the rampage, its up to the caped crusader to cut them down to size.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Secret of the Castle

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: After reuniting with his long-lost father, Po must train a village of clumsy pandas to help him defeat a supernatural warrior who becomes stronger with each battle.

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: After an alien race called the Boov take over Earth, a resourceful human girl becomes a banished Boovs ally.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A young Viking with aspirations of becoming a dragon hunter befriends a young dragon himself and learns more about the creatures than he ever assumed.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive green ogre called Shrek whose life of solitude is disrupted by a horde of refugees who have been banished by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaads bride-to-be from a dangerous castle.

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: A family of ducks decides to leave the safety of a New England pond for an adventurous trip to Jamaica. However, their well-laid plans quickly go awry when they get lost and wind up in New York City.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, a robot named Roz must learn to adapt to its new surroundings. Building relationships with the native animals, Roz soon develops a parental bond with an orphaned gosling.

programme.desc: Now graduating seniors, the Barden Bellas enter an international a cappella competition which no American team has ever won.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: After the highs of winning the world championships, the Bellas find themselves split apart. But when they get the chance to reunite for an overseas USO tour, this group of awesome nerds will come together to make some music one last time.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Believing theyve left behind the shadowy figures from the past, billionaire Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia, fully embrace their inextricable connection and shared life of luxury. But just as the Greys begin to step into their new roles, sinister events come to light and jeopardise their happy ending before it even begins.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: When a DJs sardonic exhortation to a late-night caller to wipe out a bar full of yuppies is taken literally, his world falls apart. Years later, on the point of suicide, he is saved by a similar casualty, a former medievalist whose wife was a victim of the bar bloodbath, and offered a chance for redemption by the mans quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: The story of British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to become the most famous reggae musician in the world.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent-turned-bodyguard finds danger and romance while protecting an entertainer from a stalker.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: The Kings Speech
programme.desc: Afflicted with a stammer, Prince Albert, the Duke of York, dreads the speaking engagements that come with being the son of King George V.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: With the German Army now just across the Channel, newly-appointed Prime Minister Winston Churchill must decide between negotiating a peace treaty with Hitler or standing firm. With the King, the public and his own political party all questioning his wisdom, the hard-drinking Churchill has to survive his own darkest hour and rally the country behind him.

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: Andy Dufresne and Ellis Boyd `Red Redding are two prisoners serving long sentences in the vicious Shawshank jail. The two come to terms with their imprisonment while surviving the sadistic acts of prison warden Samuel Norton, and for both, a different sort of redemption awaits.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Breaking Point
programme.desc: Two adopted brothers and rival dancers are thrust together when they are both invited to audition for the World Breaking Championships.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Four unlikely warriors rise from the sewers and join forces with fearless reporter April ONeil to save New York from Shredder and his evil minions.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Charlie Bucket comes from a poor family, and spends most of his time dreaming about the chocolate that he loves but usually cant afford. Things change when Willy Wonka, head of the very popular Wonka Chocolate empire, announces a contest in which five gold tickets have been hidden in chocolate bars. Charlie is one of the five kids who finds a lucky ticket and goes on a tour of Wonkas chocolate factory.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking
programme.desc: Mollie is a pregnant woman whose partner has deserted her. When she goes into labour, friendly taxi driver James rushes her to hospital and the pair become firm friends. He slowly falls in love with her and her baby Mikey, but shes still looking for her perfect partner, not realising hes right under her nose. However we can hear Mikeys thoughts, and he wants James as his Dad.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: A New York couple go to an orphanage to adopt a brother for their only son, but instead come away with a little mouse. On arrival at his new home, the diminutive rodent receives a lukewarm welcome by the boy - and an even frostier reception from the pet cat. Featuring a mixture of live action and animation.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the childrens story about the adventures of a small mouse, blending live action and computer-animated characters. The eponymous hero befriends a tiny bird wounded by a sinister falcon, but he must enlist the help of the dreaded family cat if he is to protect his new-found friend.

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: Two siblings set out on a mission to rescue their ex-spy parents. Summoned back to work from their uneventful lives, the adults run into trouble while on duty. When the children are called upon to help them, they find out about their parents former identities while at the same time developing a greater appreciation for each other.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking Too
programme.desc: A wisecracking toddler deals with toilet training, bickering parents and a baby sister in this sequel to the 1989 hit.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma - having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Protean Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Clerks
programme.desc: Following a day in the life of a pair of New Jersey shop workers. On his day off, Dante is forced to open the convenience store where he works. His laid back friend works in the video store next door - if he can be bothered - and together the pair discuss sex, girls, and movie trivia. They also manage to fit in a wake and a rooftop hockey game in an effort to pass another day.

programme.title: In and Out
programme.desc: The entire town is watching with bated breath as one of their own is up for an Oscar. They get more than they bargain for when he outs his high-school English teacher, who then has to prove to everyone, especially his fiancee, that hes straight. The press turn up and one reporter in particular is making life very difficult.

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Sporting billionaire brothers reverse the roles of a Wall Street commodities broker and a street hustler.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthors nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect, when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone in the first `Superman movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helpless.

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Clark Kents class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma - having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Protean Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owners kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Sporting billionaire brothers reverse the roles of a Wall Street commodities broker and a street hustler.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he cant skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his grans house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he cant putt and the golfing establishment arent happy to have him around.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon

programme.title: Clerks
programme.desc: Following a day in the life of a pair of New Jersey shop workers. On his day off, Dante is forced to open the convenience store where he works. His laid back friend works in the video store next door - if he can be bothered - and together the pair discuss sex, girls, and movie trivia. They also manage to fit in a wake and a rooftop hockey game in an effort to pass another day.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: Cats and Dogs
programme.desc: Unknown to humans, all-out war between cats and dogs has raged since the beginning of time. Now the cats face defeat if scientist Professor Brody can perfect a formula that will make all humans non-allergic to dogs. The cats leader, Mr Tinkles, plans to steal the serum, but first he must get past fearless dog agent Lou who, thanks to a mistake in recruitment, guards the Brody family.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive green ogre called Shrek whose life of solitude is disrupted by a horde of refugees who have been banished by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaads bride-to-be from a dangerous castle.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Ogre Shrek and his new wife Fiona are surprised to discover a letter from her parents, inviting them over for dinner. Fiona is eager to show off her new husband, but her parents dont yet know shes an ogre. Taking Donkey along, they set off for Far Far Away to visit them, but the trip is hampered by the jealousy of a wicked fairy godmother and her hired assassin, Puss in Boots.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie.

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: Looking for the days when he felt like a `real ogre, shrek makes an ill advised pact with Rumpelstiltskin. Banished to a Shrek-less version of the land of Far Far Away, the unfortunate ogre must once again win the love of Princess Fiona if hes to ever get back home.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Dom Cobb is is an absolute pro at stealing ideas from peoples minds during the dream state but now he is being challenged to perform the reverse: plant an idea in the mind of a target. The ultimate in corporate espionage, and much is at stake if Dom cant pull it off.

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock is trying to take down Carlton Drake, the notorious and brilliant founder of the Life Foundation. While investigating one of Drakes experiments, Eddies body merges with the alien Venom -- leaving him with superhuman strength and power. Twisted, dark and fueled by rage, Venom tries to control the new and dangerous abilities that Eddie finds so intoxicating.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: Eddie Brock is still struggling to coexist with the shape-shifting extraterrestrial Venom. When deranged serial killer Cletus Kasady also becomes host to an alien symbiote, Brock and Venom must put aside their differences to stop his reign of terror.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.title: Psycho Therapy: The Shallow Tale of a Writer Who Decided to Write About a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A writer befriends a retired serial killer in a desperate attempt to find inspiration for his next novel and save his marriage. Covering as his marriage counselor, the killer teaches him his methods as reality becomes deadlier than fiction.

programme.title: Ick
programme.desc: Science teacher Hanks life changes when he reconnects with his first love and suspects a new student is his daughter, all while facing an alien threat in their town.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.title: Black Bag
programme.desc: When his beloved wife, Kathryn, is suspected of betraying the nation, intelligence agent George Woodhouse faces the ultimate test -- loyalty to his marriage or his country.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: After jumping back into the dating pool, single mother Bridget Jones finds herself caught between a younger man and her sons science teacher.

programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A weekend getaway turns bloody and violent when a subservient android thats built for human companionship goes haywire.

programme.title: The Woman in the Yard
programme.desc: Ramona becomes crippled by grief after the death of her husband, leaving her to care for her two children alone in her farmhouse. Her sadness soon turns to fear when a spectral woman in black appears on her front lawn, warning her "todays the day."

programme.title: The Stranger in My Home
programme.desc: Ali meets a mysterious man who claims to be the father of her teenage daughter, Katie. What begins as an unsettling encounter soon spirals into a nightmare of long-buried secrets, lies and obsession.

programme.title: Lake George
programme.desc: Don is strong-armed by mobsters to execute a hit on Phyllis, but instead the two hatch a plan to steal money from the people who want her dead.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Sick
programme.desc: While quarantining at her familys lake house during the pandemic, Parker and her best friend are threatened by an unexpected visitor.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Theres Something in the Barn
programme.desc: Bill moves his American wife Carol and children Nora and Lucas to Norway where hes inherited a family estate. There, Lucas discovers a mischievous barn elf from ancient folklore living in the barn who elf plots to get rid of the American intruders.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: In the near future, industrial espionage of information systems is so rife, couriers have the information transmitted into implants in their brain that can hold gigabytes of information. Johnny Mnemonic is one of these couriers whos doubled his capacity to a dangerous 180 gigabytes and if he doesnt download in 24 hours, hell die. Unfortunately, a gang of Japanese Yakuza mobsters are after whats in his head.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman befriends some teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldnt get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Gator Creek
programme.desc: Vacation turns disaster when Kyle and her friends escape a plane crash in the desolate Louisiana everglades, only to discover theres something more dangerous lurking in the shallows.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Restore Point
programme.desc: In 2041 central Europe, Detective Em investigates the case of a murdered couple where a restoration team brings one of them back to life.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family becomes convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: A young photographer uncovers a dark secret when he meets his girlfriends seemingly friendly parents for the first time at their posh estate.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: When New York City comes under attack from an alien invasion, a woman and other survivors try to find a way to safety. They soon learn that they must remain absolutely silent as the mysterious creatures are drawn to the slightest sound.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas bitter big brother has to find his Christmas spirit before the season is ruined for the whole world.

programme.title: A Boy Called Christmas
programme.desc: An ordinary young boy called Nikolas sets out on an adventure into the snowy north in search of his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of the elves, Elfhelm. Taking with him a headstrong reindeer called Blitzen and a loyal pet mouse, Nikolas soon meets his destiny.

programme.title: Genie
programme.desc: With his life unraveling around him, Bernard dusts off a jewelry box and unintentionally releases genie Flora, who might just be able to help him.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: Christmas With the Kranks
programme.desc: Luther Krank, fed up with the commerciality of Christmas, decides to skip the holiday and go on vacation with his wife, an easy decision to make with their daughter away anyway, but when she suddenly decides to come home, uproar ensues in the rush to celebrate Christmas at the last minute.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: The Grinch and his loyal dog, Max, live a solitary existence inside a cave on Mount Crumpet. His main source of aggravation comes during Christmastime when his neighbours in Whoville celebrate the holidays with a bang. When the Whos decide to make Christmas bigger and brighter, the disgruntled Grinch realises there is one way to gain peace and quiet. With help from Max, the green grump hatches a scheme to pose as Santa Claus, steal Christmas and silence the Whos holiday cheer once and for all.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A young boy who doesnt believe in Santa Claus is shocked to see a train stop outside his window on Christmas Eve destined for the North Pole. When he accepts an invitation from the conductor to climb on board, he embarks on a white-knuckle ride to Santas headquarters where he learns an invaluable lesson about the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A placid small town is brought to its knees by an infestation of destructive small creatures with a vicious sense of humour.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Its a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: George Bailey has so many problems he is thinking about ending it all - and its Christmas! As the angels discuss George, we see his life in flashback. As George is about to jump from a bridge, he ends up rescuing his guardian angel, Clarence - who then shows George what his town would have looked like if it hadnt been for all his good deeds over the years.

programme.title: Its a Wonderful Life

As George is about to jump from a bridge, he ends up rescuing his guardian angel, Clarence - who then shows George what his town would have looked like if it hadnt been for all his good deeds over the years.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas bitter big brother has to find his Christmas spirit before the season is ruined for the whole world.

programme.title: A Boy Called Christmas
programme.desc: An ordinary young boy called Nikolas sets out on an adventure into the snowy north in search of his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of the elves, Elfhelm. Taking with him a headstrong reindeer called Blitzen and a loyal pet mouse, Nikolas soon meets his destiny.

As George is about to jump from a bridge, he ends up rescuing his guardian angel, Clarence - who then shows George what his town would have looked like if it hadnt been for all his good deeds over the years.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: The outwardly charming and intelligent psychopath Dr Lecter is in Florence, masquerading as a museum curator. A greedy cop discovers his true identity, and plans to hand him over to someone willing to pay, but things do not go to plan when female FBI agent Clarice Starling gets a call to help Lecters only living victim - the hideously deformed Mason Verger.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sants remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcocks day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: Melancholia
programme.desc: A German ex-pat living in London is confronted by his past when hes asked to assassinate a Chilean murderer who is visiting London.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with 23 separate personalities kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls, who must try to escape before his terrifying 24th personality finally comes to light.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The violent story of a Mafia family fighting to establish supremacy in the American business world following World War II, where an assassination attempt leaves Vito Corleone too ill to run the family business, forcing his sons Michael and Sonny to lead the Corleones into a vendetta-filled war with other mob families.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleones 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: Oceans Twelve
programme.desc: Casino mobster Benedict knows who stole his money and he wants it back. Danny and his crew of thieves have just two weeks to steal $190m, or their lives will be forfeit, but who is the mystery thief competing for the loot? This time Benedicts ex-girlfriend is on their side, even an integral part of the plan.

programme.title: Oceans Thirteen
programme.desc: The remaining members of Danny Oceans gang regroup to jeopardise the nefarious plans of a businessman who double-crossed one of Dannys old friends. The team plan to ruin the opening of his glitzy Las Vegas casino and hotel by rigging the games and ensuring that every punter goes home with a jackpot.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Based on three hybridising narrative strands, three groups of villains are intent on retrieving a missing diamond. Turkish and Tommy team up with a pugilistic Irish gypsy named Mickey for the purpose of rigging unlicensed boxing matches. However, their opponent also arranges some dodgy betting with the courier of the stolen diamond, who subsequently goes missing. To complicate further, a New York gangster arrives on the scene.

programme.sub-title: One Flew Over the Conners Nest

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Spencer makes a play to poach a big client from Andre; Ricky considers where to head next; Reggie fights for what he is owed; Tracy takes a stand with her boss; Charles gets insights from his coach.

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.sub-title: Fagmalion Part One: Gay It Forward
programme.desc: Karen sets Will up with her cousin Barry, who turns out to be a geek who has just emerged from the closet. Will and Jack take on the task of moulding Barry into the perfect gay man.

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.sub-title: Fagmalion Part Two: Attack of the Clones
programme.desc: Will and Jack continue their campaign to transform Karens cousin Barry, which brings back uncomfortable memories for Will of his own clumsy coming-out in the 80s.

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Jack gets into Karens bad books when he is befriended by her nemesis Lorraine. Meanwhile, Will and Grace try to catch up with a night of board games.

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Sissy Palmer-Ginsburg moves in with Jack, but Will finds it difficult to come to terms with her, and Grace faces an identity crisis as a wife.

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.sub-title: Fagmalion Part Three: Bye Bye Beardy
programme.desc: Will and Jack give Barrys makeover the final touches before launching his new look at a charity event. Meanwhile, Karen is reunited with an old rival.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Aidan finally says `those three words, leaving Carrie guilt-ridden about her affair with Big. Meanwhile, all is well with Charlottes new engagement until Trey springs an all-too-odd pre-nup on her, Miranda discovers that phone sex can be as fulfilling as the real thing - and just as painful, while Samantha, riddled with the flu, panics that shes going to end up alone.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Is sex ever safe? Carries affair with Big puts a strain on her relationship with Aidan, and in an unexpected twist, Carrie and Natasha come face to face. Meanwhile, Charlottes life is taken over by bride-mania, Miranda finds herself attracted to a man who wears a sandwich costume, and Samanthas latest lover forces her to confront the dangers of her sexual habits.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Is honesty really the best policy? Carrie contemplates telling Aidan about her affair with Big. Meanwhile, the night before their wedding, Charlotte realises that Trey may not be the perfect man, Miranda convinces herself that there is no harm in telling a `little white lie, and Samantha has a party of her own with one of the groomsmen.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Can you ever really escape your past? Carrie, Samantha and Miranda flee to LA to kick back and let go. Samantha samples some LA goods and Miranda gets in touch with her wild side, but Carries demons continue to haunt her. Meanwhile, Charlotte is suffering from the bedroom blues and tries to get to the heart of the matter.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Is it really whats on the outside that counts? Carrie enters the hip LA scene when she falls for a slick guy with what seem like the perfect credentials. Meanwhile, Samantha meets Hugh Hefner, the girls are invited to a Playboy Mansion bash, and Miranda realises LA has contributed to some unpleasant changes in an old friend. Elsewhere, Charlotte meets the girls out west.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Jim quickly learns the downside of management after he informs the staff that theres not enough money for everyone to get a COLA raise, including Dwight trying to rally everyone against him. Elsewhere, Pam pushes for cash instead of traditional wedding gifts.

programme.desc: The Dunder Mifflin staff head to Niagara Falls for Jim and Pams wedding, with the understanding that her pregnancy is a forbidden discussion topic.

programme.title: Worlds Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: Also known as the Yosemite Park Killer, Cary Stayner murdered four women in 1999 before his capture. During his trial it was suggested his actions were a result of a tragic childhood. Many years before, his brother was abducted but Cary escaped.

programme.title: Stop Search Seize
programme.desc: Join Irelands Customs teams as they, with the help of the Irish police, try to stop organised smugglers from bringing drugs, cars and even exotic animals into the country.

programme.title: Send in the Dogs UK
programme.desc: In Greater Manchester, PC Greaves and his German Shepherd Riley foil some teenage thieves in the process of robbing a discount store. Then the pair check out a break-in at a railway yard.

programme.title: Brit Cops: Rapid Response
programme.desc: Following rapid response officers, the fastest cops in Britain, as they crack down on crime.

programme.title: Brit Cops: Law and Disorder
programme.desc: Charting the exploits of the City of London police who are charged with safeguarding the Square Mile at the heart of the crime-ridden capital.

programme.title: The Real Manhunter
programme.desc: Following Ex-Detective, Senior Investigating Officer, Colin Sutton as he looks back at his most important cases and how they were solved.

programme.title: Killer In My Village

programme.desc: Bao Bao the panda and Cassandra the crane are best friends. When Cassandra announces that autumn is almost here and she will soon leave, Bao Bao is upset at her imminent departure and prepares himself for life without her. Bao Bao learns that Cassandra is only leaving for the winter months, and he should make the most of her company while he can.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Savannah Craze
programme.desc: Doris the duck is fed up of always playing the same old games with her friends. She wants to invent a new and fun game they can all play but her other friends are reluctant to join in. She heads off on her own, and soon the other animals are intrigued by the strange bouncy boingy noises that can be heard across the savannah.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of a Long Night in the Jungle
programme.desc: Giggles and Tickles are so excited about their birthday the next day that they vow to stay up all night long so that they dont miss a single moment of it. The other animals on the savannah are tired and soon go to bed. Can the mischievous monkeys find ways to keep themselves awake all night and still enjoy their birthday?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of a the Record-Breaking Puffins
programme.desc: Gunnar the gull is encouraging the puffins to break as many records as they can. Their noise is distracting Hercule Moustache, who is busy trying to build a beach sculpture. The puffins do their best not to disturb the walrus.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Ronald and His Boulders
programme.desc: Ronald the rhinos favourite pastime is bashing boulders - but one day he realises there are no more boulders left to bash on the savannah. Ronald sets out to find something else to bash - with almost catastrophic consequences.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the House of Leaves
programme.desc: Nelson the elephant wants to build the biggest and best house of leaves ever. His nephew Nigel is eager to help out, but Nelson is worried that the leaf house might be too fragile for his exuberant young nephew. When the house of leaves comes crashing down, Nelson wastes no time in telling Nigel off.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Gertie the Goat
programme.desc: Gertie the goat has agreed to take Bao Bao the panda on a climbing expedition up the So Hi Mountains. The other animals advise Gertie against the trip, since pandas are not renowned for their climbing skills. Will Gertie and Bao Bao prove the others wrong, or will they need some help from their friends?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Jungle Ball
programme.desc: The Jungle Ball is imminent and all the animals are busy finding their dance partners for the night. All except Reginald - nobody has ever asked him to dance with them at the Jungle Ball. He sets off in search of a dance partner, but has he left it too late?

programme.desc: Two white rhinos are moved to Ol Pejeta from a nearby ranch after they discovered that poachers had been watching the animals.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: With the number of elephants on the rise, as do the numbers of conflicts. Ol Pejeta has to deal with a gang of crop raiding elephants. The order is given to detusk 3 elephants, but first the team will have to remove a collar from a blind elephant.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: A look at the plight of chimpanzees that survive the bush meat trade to become captive animals. Sweetwater sanctuary is home to 50 chimpanzees. At the same time, we look at the reintroduction of colubus monkeys into the Ewaso river area of Ol Pejeta.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: Ol Pejeta Conservancy is Kenyas largest and busiest private game reserve, a vast reserve that covers 85.000 acres and is home to over 15.000 animals, including some of Africas rarest and most endangered species.

programme.title: The Predators Playbook
programme.desc: An exploration of the unique features that allow predators to survive in often hostile environments,. such as speed and agility to undetectable camouflage.

programme.title: Wildlife ER
programme.desc: Check out vet Phils clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinics favourite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew whos the catch of the day.

programme.title: Wildlife ER
programme.desc: The team scramble to help a trio of troubled baby wallabies and a koala having seizures. Plus, a kookaburra has feather-implant surgery and a spoonbill gets corrective shoes.

programme.title: Pride Rules
programme.desc: Say hello to a season of plenty as flood waters recede and vast herds of prey return to the Chobes banks. Watch Keeza and her cub make a break for it.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A look at the lives of monkeys, chimps, orangutans, and apes living at the worlds biggest sanctuary, the 65-acre Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre in Wareham, Dorset.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A look at the lives of monkeys, chimps, orangutans, and apes living at the worlds biggest sanctuary, the 65-acre Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre in Wareham, Dorset.

programme.title: Patrick Aryees Wild World
programme.desc: Patrick travels to Yellowstone National Park, where he discovers the positive, top-down domino effect that wolves have on their environment.

programme.title: Patrick Aryees Wild World
programme.desc: Is our appetite for salmon wiping out the lynx? Join Patrick Aryee as he seeks answers to this curious question.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Attenboroughs Journey
programme.desc: Follow David Attenborough around the globe as he films David Attenboroughs First Life.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Rise of Animals: Triumph of the Vertebrates
programme.sub-title: From the Seas to the Skies
programme.desc: David Attenborough uses fossil evidence and CGI to reveal the story of the vertebrates, from their humble origins as the primitive fish that once swam in ancient seas, to their radical move onto land and beyond.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Rise of Animals: Triumph of the Vertebrates
programme.desc: David Attenborough uses fossil evidence and CGI to reveal how mammals developed from tiny forest dwellers to become the dominant life form on the planet.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Come face-to-face with alphas who use might to subdue enemies, from sea lions and cape buffalo to Canada geese and lionesses.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Meet the ugliest alphas of the animal world, from warthogs and giant African bullfrogs to wild turkeys and Nile crocodiles.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway
programme.desc: Two teams of researchers investigate the migration patterns of the oceans largest and deadliest sharks. They follow their underwater routes and show their hunting behaviours, and social hierarchies.

programme.title: The Wadden Sea
programme.desc: As an abandoned seal pup navigates heavy storms and hungry predators, hares fight for females, brent geese prepare to fly to the high Arctic and more.

programme.title: The Wadden Sea
programme.desc: While shell ducks forage and defend their home, young rabbits discover theyre not safe and spoonbills fight over nests.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Come face-to-face with alphas who use might to subdue enemies, from sea lions and cape buffalo to Canada geese and lionesses.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Meet the ugliest alphas of the animal world, from warthogs and giant African bullfrogs to wild turkeys and Nile crocodiles.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway
programme.desc: Two teams of researchers investigate the migration patterns of the oceans largest and deadliest sharks. They follow their underwater routes and show their hunting behaviours, and social hierarchies.

programme.title: The Secret Life Of The Hermit Crab
programme.desc: Dives into the life cycle of hermit crabs in Guadeloupe as they embark on their migration journey to release their eggs into the ocean.

programme.title: Africas Wild Horizons
programme.desc: In the Limpopo region of South Africa lies an ancient land. From rolling grasslands to rocky gorges, wildlife has learnt to make the most of whats on offer. This is the Waterberg, a land of plenty.

programme.title: Africas Wild Horizons
programme.desc: In this programme we look at the Vredefort Crater in South Africa and the life it supports. From rocky outcrops to grassland, and from wetlands to mighty rivers, each habitat provides a niche for a host of creatures.

programme.title: Africas Wild Horizons
programme.desc: Trapped in one of Africas great deserts is a lush, hidden world. It is an untamed wilderness unlike any other on Earth. Fed by a mighty river that travels from distant mountains, it is a vast mosaic of life, which pulsates with vivid beauty.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: A once-in-a-generation drought has sucked all the moisture from surrounding rivers and the Conservation team is struggling to keep up with the swath of thirsty creatures.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: Eco-tourism isnt just a background player in the operation of Ol Pej, its the financial backbone that keeps the park operating. From comfortable camping to ulta-luxurious accommodations, the guests that stay at Ol Pejeta live among nature.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: A baby rhinos mother is illegally shot and Ol Pej staff have to calm the wild baby. Its not ideal to separate the calf from her mother, but the situation is dire, and the calf will have to be hand-raised.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: Kenyas largest and busiest private game reserve including some of Africas rarest and most endangered species.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild
programme.desc: Its a critical time for two black rhinos in Zambia. Four year old female Apson and fourteen year old bull Kango are at the core of a complex relocation mission thats part of a grand plan to save a species.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild
programme.desc: Deep in Kafue National Park, the largest and wildest protected area in Zambia, a team of biologists and vets from the Zambian Carnivore Programme (ZCP) races against time to save and protect Africas apex predators.

programme.title: Into the Wild India
programme.desc: Rajan is the powerful alpha male who sits at the head of an unusually large troop. He has done well to sustain such a big group, but the future doesnt look so bright. There are more mouths to feed, and yet his jungle home is shrinking.

programme.title: Into the Wild India
programme.desc: Nestled on the edge of the ancient city of Jodhpur, the luxurious Temple Gardens are home to a huge troop of Hanuman langurs, who enjoy a peaceful life of bounty. Yet, the troop has a strict hierarchy.

programme.title: Into the Wild India
programme.desc: In the hot, and humid tropical forests of Southern India, a female King Cobra is on a mission. She needs to find a mate, find food and lay her eggs, all before the monsoon arrives in 5 months time.

programme.title: Into the Wild India
programme.desc: The day-to-day lives and challenges of some of Indias most iconic species and creatures.

programme.title: Patrick Aryees Wild World
programme.desc: Join Patrick in the Kruger National Park, where he is exploring whether ivory poaching can lead to food shortages for local people.

programme.title: Patrick Aryees Wild World
programme.desc: Patrick is in California as he searches for answers to why underwater are forests in sharp decline, and why otters might be the solution.

programme.title: Matsalu Moose: Wild Giants of the Baltics
programme.desc: Matsalu Bay in the Baltic Sea is an important stopover for migrating birds and home to many rare plant and animal species. For most of the year, moose roam the marshes and plains of Matsalu, which is a nature reserve and under strict protection.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A look at the lives of monkeys, chimps, orangutans, and apes living at the worlds biggest sanctuary, the 65-acre Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre in Wareham, Dorset.

programme.title: Secret World of Sound with David Attenborough
programme.desc: Using the latest audio technology, David Attenborough explores the crucial role of sound in nature, examining how it shapes and influences the everyday lives of animals, from communication to their behaviour and decisions.

programme.title: Secret World of Sound with David Attenborough
programme.desc: From melodic songs to strange hums, David Attenborough sets out to discover the sounds that gibbons, lyrebirds, bull elk, and more use to find a mate and warn off the competition.

programme.title: Secret World of Sound with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David Attenborough follows baby animals as they communicate in their quest for survival, using sound to beg and call for help in the vulnerable early days of life in the natural world.

programme.title: Africas Wild Roommates -- How Animals Share Bed and Board
programme.desc: An exploration of the joys and sorrows of living together, following a range of different animals in Africa that live together in communities.

programme.desc: A look at the lives of monkeys, chimps, orangutans, and apes living at the worlds biggest sanctuary, the 65-acre Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre in Wareham, Dorset.

programme.title: The Wadden Sea
programme.desc: A period of calm weather dries out the Wadden Sea area. But a devastating storm is coming, and fierce sandstorms threaten to bury spoon chicks alive on the beach.

programme.title: The Wadden Sea

programme.title: Battle for Pandora

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: The ships power reserves are critically low and Dr. Nicholas Rush tries to locate the source of the problem. Power consumption is ordered to be kept minimal by Colonel Young. When all looks bleak, and the only power left is in the ships life support system, Destiny approaches a three planet solar system with sincere hope.

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: A risky plan is hatched to abandon the Destiny using the last working shuttle and the crew is hinging all their hopes on one of the three nearby planets being habitable. Theres only room for 17 people and a lottery that plays with human lives will determine who goes and who stays.

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: Despite severe rationing and stringent security, Destinys water reserves are plummeting as fast as the crews morale. Rush is stumped by the latest setback and informs his comrades that in order to survive, they must find an alternative source of H2O right away. The nearest planet is a frozen wasteland surrounded by a thin, poisonous atmosphere.

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: International Oversight Advisory scientists have hatched a plan that could return the crew to Earth, but the plan is far from foolproof and carries potentially deadly consequences. General ONeill and Home World Command instruct Colonel Young to implement their orders.

programme.title: Stargate Universe

Following the dedicated teams at Heathrows Terminal Three, Calais and Dover, as well as the enforcement teams cracking down on illegal workers in the North West and North East of England.

programme.title: Send in the Dogs UK
programme.desc: Two new recruits, Eddie and Keela, are brought in from the South Yorkshire police force after assisting in such high-profile cases as the search for Madeleine McCann and investigations into alleged child abuse in Jersey.

programme.title: Caught Red Handed
programme.desc: Two men attacking a jewellers with an axe end up looking less like dangerous criminals and more like comedy characters. Also, after a series of muggings of elderly women in Norwich, the moment a victim buys a lottery ticket proves to be the key to the case.

programme.title: Caught Red Handed
programme.desc: Con men pose as police officers to steal thousands of pounds from elderly victims, but the ringleader makes a crucial mistake. Also, a shoplifter dances like nobody is watching, but the security cameras are filming her every move.

programme.title: Caught Red Handed
programme.desc: An adventure centre and a garage are burgled, but the businesss own cameras dont show the thiefs face, so the hope is that street cameras can help crack the case. Also, a partially blind man is deceived at a cashpoint by an unscrupulous thief.

programme.title: Stop Search Seize
programme.desc: Join Irelands Customs teams as they, with the help of the Irish police, try to stop organised smugglers from bringing drugs, cars and even exotic animals into the country.

programme.title: UK Border Force
programme.desc: When a `student from Pakistan answers poorly when hes questioned by officers, it takes two days and three officers to get to the bottom of the mystery before the man is refused entry to Britain. Meanwhile, the enforcement team at Beckett House, London, raid a cleaning company.

programme.title: Nothing to Declare
programme.desc: Follow Australian Customs and Border Protection officers as they attempt to enforce the countrys various quarantine, customs, immigration and finance laws.

programme.title: Caught on Dashcam
